item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to the woRk togetheR Warsaw Group! We are a community of R-Users in Warsaw who support each other in using R for research and business. Our focus is providing a space for intermediate users to learn from each other. We have monthly, 2-hour work sessions where people bring their computers to work on their own projects, and ask each other questions as needed. Let us know if you’re interested!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
